original_text: Just as he had done at Bethel, Josiah removed all the shrines at the high places that the kings of Israel had built in the towns of Samaria and that had aroused the Lord’s anger.
korean_text: 전에 이스라엘 여러 왕이 사마리아 각 성읍에 지어서 여호와를 격노하게 한 산당을 요시야가 다 제거하되 벧엘에서 행한 모든 일대로 행하고

sentences.original_text: Just as he had done at Bethel,
Josiah removed all the shrines at the high places
sentences.korean_translation: 요시야가 산당에 있던 모든 산당들을 제거했다

sentences.original_text: that the kings of Israel had built
and that had aroused the Lord's anger.
